settings.editor: Learn the fundamentals of pranayama so you can design a profound daily practice that will enrich your life? In our online "Transcend With Yoga" Class workshop, you’ll discover that pranayama is so much more than breath control.

Six practices and techniques can let you go and optimize absorption of prana — bringing you more peace and a better understanding of who you are. When enroll, receive automatically access 8 additional online workshops from our instructors.
